entity.name: MARPRIPINFO
entity.query: select ROW_NUMBER() OVER() as ROWNO, m.ID, m.entname, m.SUPERORGID, (select o.name from a_organ o where o.id=m.SUPERORGID) as superorgname, m.REGNO, m.oldregno, m.lerep, m.tel, m.DOM, m.opscope, m.enttype, (select ec.name from CODE_EntTypeCode ec where m.enttype = ec.code) as enttypename, m.enttypeitem, m.industryphy, (select ic.name from CODE_IndCode ic where ic.code=m.industryphy) as industryphyname, substr(m.industryco,1,2) as industrycoda, (select e.ARCHNO from REG_ENTRECORDNO e where e.MARPRID=m.ID and e.REGNO=m.REGNO) as ARCHNO, (case length(m.industryco) when 3 then m.industryco when 4 then substr(m.industryco,1,3) end) as industrycoxi, (select icc.name from CODE_IndCode icc where icc.code=m.industryco) as industrycoxiname, (case length(m.industryco) when 4 then m.industryco end) as industrycoxiao, (select cc.credLevel from CRE_CreInfo cc where cc.MarPrID=m.ID fetch first 1 rows only ) as credLevel, m.venind, m.optype, (select bc.name from CODE_BusTypeCode bc where bc.code=m.optype) as optypename, m.enttypepro, m.state, (case m.state when '01' then '受理' when '02' then '录入' when '03' then '待核准' when '04' then '已核准' when '05' then '已驳回' when '06' then '正常' when '07' then '注销' when '08' then '撤销' when '09' then '迁出' when '10' then '审核驳回通知书已打印' when '11' then '吊销' when '13' then '系统内迁入中...(瞬间状态)' when '15' then '企业改制更新中...(瞬间状态)' when '16' then '企业改制审批通过，原历史数据' when '20' then '无效数据(数据已经迁出)' end) as statename, m.regtype, m.estDate, m.apprdate, m.opFrom, m.opTo, (select min(date(j.WarFrom)) from SYS_CauInfo j where j.MarPrID = m.ID) as jslx, m.ORGID, (select o.name from a_organ o where o.id=m.ORGID) as orgname from REG_MARPRIPINFO m where regtype !='02' order by REGNO
